lip_collection.tagline: Make it pop with this bold lipstick.
lip_collection.description: Cherry Pop will have your lips dancing all day long with its creamy, long-lasting formula. Packed with juicy cherry extract, it keeps your lips vibrant, hydrated, and oh-so-kissable!

colour_options.name: Cherry Bomb
colour_options.description: Dive into a deep, sultry cherry red and make every evening unforgettable.

colour_options.name: Ruby Rush
colour_options.description: Exude confidence and glamour with this classic, rich red.

colour_options.name: Pink Blossom
colour_options.description: Soft, romantic pink for your everyday fairy tale.

colour_options.name: Coral Crush
colour_options.description: Infuse tropical vibes into your look with this fun coral-pink shade.

lip_collection.tagline: Experience the perfect matte finish with Cherry Crush Matte Lipstick.
lip_collection.description: Get that velvety, matte perfection with Cherry Crush! This smooth, full-coverage lipstick is enriched with cherry seed oil, ensuring your lips stay moisturised and utterly fabulous without a hint of shine.

colour_options.name: Crimson
colour_options.description: Ignite your look with this intense, fiery red.

colour_options.name: Blush
colour_options.description: Embrace subtle beauty with this delicate, muted pink.

colour_options.name: Peachy
colour_options.description: Freshen up with this peach-toned pink, perfect for sunny days.

colour_options.name: Merlot
colour_options.description: Unleash your mysterious side with this deep, wine-red hue.

lip_collection.tagline: For a luscious, glossy finish, choose Cherry Gloss Lipstick.
lip_collection.description: Shine bright with Cherry Gloss! This high-shine lipstick delivers a burst of colour and a nourishing blend of cherry extract and vitamin E, leaving your lips soft, glossy, and irresistible.

colour_options.name: Ruby Shine
colour_options.description: Light up the room with this bright, ruby red gloss.

colour_options.name: Peony Pink
colour_options.description: Add a touch of sparkle with this shimmering pink.

colour_options.name: Cherry Plum
colour_options.description: Perfect for a night out, this rich, plummy cherry shade is a showstopper.

colour_options.name: Rose Blush
colour_options.description: Everyday elegance is yours with this soft, romantic pink.

eye_collection.tagline: Twist and shout with vibrant hues!
eye_collection.description: Unleash your inner artist with the Cherry Twist Eyeshadow Palette. Featuring a blend of rich, cherry-inspired colours and silky textures, these shades blend effortlessly for any look - from everyday chic to nighttime drama.
Make your lashes bloom with Cherry Bloom Mascara! This volumising and lengthening formula is infused with cherry blossom extract, giving your lashes a luscious, feather-light feel.
features: Cherry blossom extract for a soft touch

eye_collection.tagline: Line it up with luscious precision!
eye_collection.description: Get the perfect line every time with Cherry Liner. This ultra-precise eyeliner is enriched with cherry extract for a smooth glide and long-lasting, smudge-proof wear.
